name: Noctilis
description: Deep Frostwake nights envelop the world in darkness, aligning with the cold and harshness of Frostwake.

name: Solstice
description: The turning point of Frostwake, marking the shortest day and the longest night of the year.

name: Glacialum
description: Signifies the end of Frostwake's coldness, with the frost beginning to recede as the world prepares for Bloomrise.

name: Umbrilis
description: Embodies early Bloomrise, where shadows lengthen and the secrets hidden in darkness become more pronounced.

name: Aetheril
description: Associated with the ethereal realm and the thinning of the veil between the mortal world and the realm of spirits.

name: Lunistice
description: Symbolizes the month of celestial harmony with the strongest influence of the moon, awakening life and enchantment.

name: Nycturnis
description: Encompasses the first days of Suncrest with shorter nights and enchanting moonlit landscapes.

name: Solaris
description: Signifies the peak of Suncrest with the sun at its most fiery, bringing warmth, light, and vibrant energy.

name: Wyrth
description: A period of change and magical energy surge, representing the vitality and spirit of Suncrest.

name: Zephyril
description: Marks the transitional phase between Suncrest and Harvestmoon with gentle breezes and ancient whispers.

name: Hesperil
description: Draws its name from the twilight hour, inviting reflection on the passage of time in the serene ambiance of late Harvestmoon.

name: Emberis
description: Marks the end of Harvestmoon, with the fading embers of warmth and light, preparing for the coming Frostwake.
